androidx.paging

Class DataSource.Factory<Key,Value>

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.paging.DataSource.Factory<Key,Value>
  • Type Parameters:
    Key - Key identifying items in DataSource.
    Value - Type of items in the list loaded by the DataSources.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LivePagedListProvider
    Enclosing class:
    DataSource<Key,Value>

    public abstract static class DataSource.Factory<Key,Value>
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for DataSources.

    Data-loading systems of an application or library can implement this interface to allow LiveData<PagedList>s to be created. For example, Room can provide a DataSource.Factory for a given SQL query: 

      @Dao
 interface UserDao {
     @Query("SELECT * FROM user ORDER BY lastName ASC")
    public abstract DataSource.Factory<Integer, User> usersByLastName();
 }
    In the above sample, Integer is used because it is the Key type of PositionalDataSource. Currently, Room uses the LIMIT/OFFSET SQL keywords to page a large query with a PositionalDataSource.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public abstract DataSource<Key,Value> create()
        Create a DataSource.

        The DataSource should invalidate itself if the snapshot is no longer valid. If a DataSource becomes invalid, the only way to query more data is to create a new DataSource from the Factory.

        LivePagedListBuilder for example will construct a new PagedList and DataSource when the current DataSource is invalidated, and pass the new PagedList through the LiveData<PagedList> to observers.

        Returns:
        the new DataSource.

      • map

        @NonNull
public <ToValue> DataSource.Factory<Key,ToValue> map(@NonNull
                                                              Function<Value,ToValue> function)
        Applies the given function to each value emitted by DataSources produced by this Factory.

        Same as mapByPage(Function), but operates on individual items.

        Type Parameters:
        ToValue - Type of items produced by the new DataSource, from the passed function.
        Parameters:
        function - Function that runs on each loaded item, returning items of a potentially new type.
        Returns:
        A new DataSource.Factory, which transforms items using the given function.
        See Also:
        mapByPage(Function), DataSource.map(Function), DataSource.mapByPage(Function)

      • mapByPage

        @NonNull
public <ToValue> DataSource.Factory<Key,ToValue> mapByPage(@NonNull
                                                                    Function<java.util.List<Value>,java.util.List<ToValue>> function)
        Applies the given function to each value emitted by DataSources produced by this Factory.

        Same as map(Function), but allows for batch conversions.

        Type Parameters:
        ToValue - Type of items produced by the new DataSource, from the passed function.
        Parameters:
        function - Function that runs on each loaded page, returning items of a potentially new type.
        Returns:
        A new DataSource.Factory, which transforms items using the given function.
        See Also:
        map(Function), DataSource.map(Function), DataSource.mapByPage(Function)

Generated javadoc for the new package structure to make it clearer which packages are bundled with the Android operating system, and which are packaged with your app's APK. Going forward, the android.* package hierarchy will be reserved for Android packages that ship with the operating system; other packages will be issued in the new androidx.* package hiearchy.
